meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jean Hernon Dave Janka Robert Slaven Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1754.

td.p: Jean Hernon, an attorney originally from New Hartford, New York
Dave Janka, a photographer from Moorestown, New Jersey
Robert Slaven, an office automation specialist from Yellowknife, Northwest Territories (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,700)

tr.td: HISTORIC QUOTES
APPROXIMATE WEIGHTS & MEASURES
POP MUSIC
VOCABULARY
ZOOLOGY
"Mc"PEOPLE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In a 1939 radio broadcast, Churchill called this country "A riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In a 1939 radio broadcast, Churchill called this country "A riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma"
